name: Pragmasoft

description:
Pragmasoft is a team of highly qualified specialists with more than 10 years of successful software development. 
We provide Mobile app development, Java server applications, Cloud computing, Graphic and web design, and Software quality assurance. 
To all our Clients we offer cutting-edge technologies, a great experience in developing commercially successful projects, exceptional quality, a wide range of services, an individual approach, and fresh ideas.
